MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65, LL66 and LL71 postcode areas of Holyhead, Anglesey and Llanerchymedd, affecting properties in Trefor, Boderdern and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.49AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and network checks and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.26AM on 14th March 2021.
